programs.name: Air India Maharaja Club
programs.summary: Air India’s Maharaja Club replaces Flying Returns with a modern four‑tier frequent flyer programme. Members earn tier and Maharaja points on Air India flights (and Star Alliance partners), unlock bonuses for direct bookings, and enjoy perks like priority services, seat upgrades and lounge access as they climb from Red to Platinum.
programs.seoDescription: Learn how Air India’s Maharaja Club works, from earning and retaining Maharaja points to tier benefits like free seat selection, lounge access, upgrade vouchers and flexible cash + points bookings across Air India and Star Alliance flights.

sections.title: Program essentials
sections.intro: Key facts to get started with Air India’s Maharaja Club.

items.label: Earning basis
items.value: 6–10 Maharaja Points per ₹100 spent on base fare + fuel surcharge; 6 Tier Points/₹100 on Air India flights

images.alt: Air India aircraft with Maharaja Club emblem against an Indian skyline
images.caption: Maharaja Club treats loyal flyers to royal perks across Air India’s hubs.

blocks.text: The Maharaja Club is a revamp of Air India’s Flying Returns programme. Members earn two types of points: Maharaja Points, which can be redeemed for award travel or cabin upgrades, and Tier Points, which determine your status level. Earnings accumulate whenever you fly Air India or Star Alliance partners, book via the website/app, shop with over 50 non‑airline partners or use co‑branded credit cards. Booking directly on airindia.com or the Air India app yields an extra 2 Maharaja Points per ₹100 on eligible flights【621792412824106†L259-L261】【621792412824106†L692-L738】.

blocks.title: Ways to earn Maharaja Points
items: 6–10 Maharaja Points per ₹100 of base fare + fuel surcharge on Air India flights, depending on tier; earn an extra 2 points/₹100 when booking via Air India’s website or app.
6 Tier Points per ₹100 of base fare + fuel surcharge on Air India flights across all tiers (1 Tier Point for every 2 Maharaja Points on Star Alliance partner flights).
Earn Maharaja Points when flying with any of the 24 Star Alliance partner airlines and present your Maharaja Club ID at booking.
Accumulate points through non‑airline partners (hotels, car rentals, lifestyle brands) and co‑branded credit cards; typical partner earnings range from 4 to 24 points per ₹100 spent.
Purchase points or transfer credit‑card rewards to top up your balance when you need more for an award flight.

blocks.title: Eligible flight activity
items: Air India‑operated flights booked with cash or Cash + Points (no points earned on reward tickets).
Flights operated by Star Alliance partners when crediting to your Maharaja account.
Partner flights do not earn Tier Points on a one‑to‑one basis; instead you earn 1 Tier Point for every 2 Maharaja Points.

blocks.text: Maharaja Points normally expire after 24 months, but the expiry of your entire balance is extended by another 24 months whenever you take a paid Air India flight (does not apply to award tickets). This means points never expire for ‘active’ members who fly at least once every two years【621792412824106†L259-L327】【571271391444121†L256-L266】.

blocks.text: Maharaja Club monitors your Tier Points and eligible flights across the past 365 days. You can move up a tier by meeting the required Tier Points or flight count, and you must meet the same threshold each year to retain your status【621792412824106†L515-L569】. Upgrades are processed automatically as soon as the qualifying threshold is reached, and your membership year resets on the date of tier upgrade.

items: Tier Points are earned only on Air India flights (6 Tier Points per ₹100) and on partner flights at 1 Tier Point per 2 Maharaja Points.
Status evaluations happen continuously; once your Tier Points or flight count crosses the threshold, your account is upgraded automatically.
Retention requires meeting the same Tier Points or flight count in the following membership year; otherwise, your status will be downgraded.
Points cannot be used to buy status; only earning flights and partner activities qualify for Tier Points.

sections.title: Discounts & perks
sections.intro: Tier‑based benefits range from basic priority services to generous fee waivers and lounge access.
bullets: Priority Connect hotline gives Silver, Gold and Platinum members fast access to customer support for bookings, ticket changes and account issues.
Fee waivers for itinerary changes scale with your tier — a discounted change fee for Silver, free domestic/international changes for Gold and multiple free changes for Platinum.
Cabin upgrade vouchers (1–3 per year depending on tier) allow domestic cabin upgrades subject to seat availability.
Complimentary extra baggage: Silver members receive +5 kg on Air India flights; Gold and Platinum receive +20 kg or one extra 23‑kg piece on Air India and Star Alliance flights.
Lounge access for Gold and Platinum members, including one guest, at Air India and Star Alliance lounges.
Fly Prior service lets Gold and Platinum members travel on an earlier domestic flight within 12 hours of their original departure (same route, cabin and day) without fees.

blocks.text: Maharaja Club does not issue generic lounge passes like some programmes, but members receive upgrade vouchers and can share points through family pooling.

items: Cabin upgrade vouchers are awarded on tier upgrade/renewal: 1 for Silver (valid 6 months), 2 for Gold (valid 9 months) and 3 for Platinum (valid 12 months), usable on domestic flights subject to availability.
Family Pool feature lets you add up to nine family members and choose how much of their earning is pooled (100%, 75% or 50%). Pooling simplifies award redemptions by combining points in one account.
Cash + Points booking allows you to pay part of a ticket in cash and part in points, helpful when your balance is low.
You can buy Maharaja Points for ₹1.50 each to top up your balance when needed; purchased points carry a 24‑month validity.

sections.title: Points policy essentials
sections.intro: Understand the rules governing your Maharaja Points and Tier Points.
bullets: Maharaja Points have a default 24‑month validity but never expire for active members — each paid Air India flight resets the expiry of your entire balance for another 24 months.
Tier Points count toward status but cannot be redeemed. Tier Points expire on a rolling 365‑day basis and determine your tier level.
You earn 6 Tier Points per ₹100 spent on Air India (base fare + fuel surcharge) across all tiers and 1 Tier Point per 2 Maharaja Points on Star Alliance partner flights.
No points are awarded on codeshare or interline flights or on award tickets.
Claim missing points up to 12 months after Air India travel or within six to twelve months for Star Alliance partners, depending on the airline.
Purchases from non‑airline partners and co‑branded credit cards earn Maharaja Points but not Tier Points.
Maharaja Points can be transferred from select bank credit cards; transfer ratios vary by issuer.

programs.name: IndiGo BluChip
programs.summary: IndiGo's BluChip program layers easy earning on base fares with stackable channel bonuses and deep discounts on prepaid add-ons.
programs.seoDescription: Understand IndiGo BluChip earning, tier shortcuts, and 6E Prime perks with a flexible guide to India's largest low-cost carrier loyalty program.

sections.title: Program essentials
sections.intro: Key facts to get started with IndiGo BluChip.

images.alt: IndiGo aircraft against an India skyline
images.caption: BluChip keeps frequent India flyers engaged across 6E hubs.

blocks.text: IndiGo BluChip rewards members for every eligible rupee spent with IndiGo and select partners, layering base earnings with tier and channel bonuses.

blocks.title: Ways to earn BluChips
items: 8 BluChips per ₹100 on base fare and fuel surcharge across IndiGo and eligible codeshare flights.
Extra BluChips when booking on the IndiGo website or mobile app via channel bonuses.
Earn on prepaid add-ons such as Seat Select, Excess Baggage, and Fast Forward.

blocks.title: Eligible flight activity
items: 6E marketed and operated flights
6E marketed flights operated by codeshare partners

blocks.text: BluChips stay valid with any earn or redeem activity at least once every 24 months.

sections.title: BluChip tier breakdown
sections.intro: Three elite tiers unlock progressively richer bonuses, 6E Prime passes, and discounts on IndiGo's most popular add-ons.

table.caption: IndiGo BluChip elite tiers at a glance

cells: 8 BluChips / ₹100 base earn + 4 BluChips / ₹100 channel bonus
10% Seat Select, Excess Baggage, Fast Forward discounts · 0 6E Prime passes · Nominees: 5

blocks.text: IndiGo reviews your spend and flight activity daily for upgrades while retention is measured across the last 365 days.

items: Upgrade evaluations happen in near real time once thresholds are crossed.
Annual retention looks back 365 days for both spend and flight requirements.
Only base fare and fuel surcharge qualify toward BluChip earnings and thresholds.
Pre-booked add-ons earn at the tier-adjusted bonus rate.

sections.title: Discounts & perks
sections.intro: BluChip tiers unlock deeper savings on IndiGo's most popular extras.
bullets: Seat selection savings apply only on pre-booked selections across the fleet.
Discounted Excess Baggage and Fast Forward services scale from 10% to 30% depending on tier.
6E Prime passes bundle Fast Forward, seat selection, and meals for frequent travelers.

blocks.text: 6E Prime passes provide bundles of priority services you can redeem or share with nominees.

items: Redeem 6E Prime passes for Fast Forward, preferred seating, and meal combos depending on your tier allotment.
Nominees enjoy the same discounted add-on pricing, making family travel cheaper.
Manage nominee access directly in your BluChip dashboard.

sections.title: Points policy essentials
sections.intro: Understand the rules that keep your BluChips active and flexible.
bullets: BluChips do not expire as long as you record activity at least once every 24 months.
All earn calculations follow Base + Tier Bonus + Channel Bonus for clear tracking.
Monitor the activity log in your account to confirm credits from flights and add-ons.

awardPlaybook.title: Search partners, not airlines
awardPlaybook.detail: Use Air Canada Aeroplan, Avianca LifeMiles, or Virgin Atlantic to book seats on Star Alliance and SkyTeam partners with fewer surcharges.

awardPlaybook.title: Leverage stopovers
awardPlaybook.detail: Programs like Aeroplan and Alaska Mileage Plan allow stopovers on one-way awards—turn a connection into a mini vacation.

awardPlaybook.title: Watch transfer bonuses
awardPlaybook.detail: Amex, Chase, and Capital One regularly offer 15–30% bonuses. Transfer only when a specific award is available.

favoriteRoutes.highlight: Redeem 50k points for one-way Delta One to Europe during off-peak dates.
Fly Japan Airlines business class for 60k miles with a free stopover in Tokyo.
Short-haul flights start at 4k points and avoid high fuel surcharges when booked through Iberia.
